channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'I started using sunbeds at 17 but now I've spent 15 years battling skin cancer'
item.description: A sunbed fanatic now warns against the dire risks of tanning after spending a total of 15 years battling skin cancer - mum-of-two Caroline Madden star...

item.title: Spain red alert as UK tourists told to make 'homemade traps' to combat infestation
item.description: Several parts of Spain are on 'red alert' over an imminent mosquito infestation following the heavy rainfall that has swept the European holiday hotsp...

item.title: Mum's heartbreak over feeling 'so far away' as baby daughter died at nursery
item.description: Genevieve Meehan, nine months old, tragically died at Tiny Toes Nursery in Stockport, with the deputy manager jailed for manslaughter and new data sho...

item.title: Final hours of wet market animals - boiled alive, rotting flesh and 'virus shedding'
item.description: Warning: distressing content. Footage shows the horrific conditions animals are kept in before being slaughtered at wet markets around the world. Expe...

item.title: Man left with horror injuries after being savaged by aggressive dog in nightmare attack
item.description: A man in his 50s has endured life-changing injuries after he was attacked by a crazed dog. Villagers in Lancashire tried to stop the animal but was un...

item.title: Man plans to use World War II bomb found in his garden as beer cooler
item.description: The bomb's discovery lead to Ross' street being shut with an explosive ordnance disposal unit ensured the device was safe.

item.title: Woman paralysed from neck down after weight loss surgery in Turkey
item.description: Danielle Peebles started getting complications from her surgery shortly after she returned from Turkey.

item.title: Student so scared of DIY he paid tradesman £180 to change batteries
item.description: Sam Daley also says he doesn’t want to speak to anyone on the phone and he lacks the confidence to negotiate so sourced the tradesman through an app.

item.title: Nine English words you probably didn’t know came from Irish
item.description: Some common words we use every day, including the name of one of the UK's main political parties, have a surprising origin in Irish.

item.title: Man claims he was shot by his dog while lying in bed
item.description: The Memphis man was 'relaxing/talking' in bed when the incident occurred
